Interface ICommunication

    The interface for implements communications

    • Method Detail

      • openCommunication

        void openCommunication()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Open communication. It may be connect, file open, etc.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication cannot be opened

      • closeCommunication

        void closeCommunication()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Close communication
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication cannot be closed

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Return open state of current communication
        Returns:
        true, if communication is opened

      • connect

        void connect()
      throws java.io.IOException
        Initiate connecting for current connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection cannot be connect due to an error

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws java.io.IOException
        Disconnect current connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection cannot be disconnect due to an error

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Return connection state of current communication
        Returns:
        the boolean

      • sendData

        void sendData​(byte[] data)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Send data over connection
        Parameters:
        data - data for send
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if cannot send data due to an error

        throws java.io.IOException
        Gets data.
        Returns:
        the data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if data cannot be received

      • doCommunication

        void doCommunication()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Do one iteration of communication loop.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if loop cannot be executed
